horizontal_reflection.title: Flip the Solar Grid!
horizontal_reflection.description: 🚀 Crisis! {{antagonist}} was taking selfies 📱 near the control panel and knocked the solar array blueprint backwards ⇄! Now the panels face deep space instead of the Sun ☀️, and life support is failing! Study the before → after symbol grids to see the flip. Mirror today's entire grid left-to-right ↔️ to restore oxygen 💨 before time runs out ⏰!

horizontal_reflection.title: Reverse the Hologram!
horizontal_reflection.description: ⚠️ Emergency! {{antagonist}} accidentally installed a mirror inside the {{component}} and now all holographic displays are backward! Captain needs the stellar maps flipped horizontally before we hit an asteroid field! Study the example grids to see the reflection pattern, then apply it to today's grid to save the ship!

horizontal_reflection.title: Fix the Inverted Blueprints!

Now the boosters point at Mission Control 🏢 instead of orbit 🛰️! Study the sample symbol grids to see the rotation. Turn today's entire grid 90° clockwise 🔃 to save everyone from fiery disaster 💥!

vertical_reflection.title: Flip the Radar Upside Down!
